Dialogue: I'll put this right through your head.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: You guys going to let him give orders? I mean he could be one of those Things.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Put it away, Sanchez. Just put it away.

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: I don't know about Copper. But I didn't go near that plasma...  But I guess you'll all rest easier if someone else is in charge.

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: Can't see anyone objecting to you, Norris.

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: Sorry, gentlemen...  ...Don't think I'd be up to it. Haven't been feeling well lately.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: I'll take it...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Maybe it should be someone a bit more even-tempered, Childs.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: ...Any objections?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: ...From what we know this Thing likes to go one on one. So we stick together as much as possible. In two's and three's.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: What do we do about those three?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: We got morphine, don't we.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Well, we keep them loaded. Stash them here in the rec room and watch 'em twenty-four hours.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Morphine? You know I was pretty close to that dog, too.

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: We should sleep in shifts.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Right. Half of us awake at all times.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: How we going to try and find out who's... you know, who's who?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Can you think of any other tests?

Speaker: fuchs
Dialogue: I'll try.  I could sure use Copper's help though.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: You can eighty-six that thought right now, man.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Also... When this Thing turns... it turns slowly at first. I think we can handle it in that state. But if it ever got to full power... from what I saw of that Norwegian camp... well, I just don't know... It would probably take it an hour or more to get like that. So no matter what anybody's doing, we all return to this room every twenty minutes. Anybody gone longer than that... anybody trying to leave... we kill 'em.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Where's that magneto? Can't find a darn thing around here any more.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: No, Doc. He's doing a real fine job.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Look for shoes, too. And burned cloth.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: That thing's too smart to be hiding any more of its clothes, MacReady.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Just keep looking.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: How's it going?

Speaker: fuchs
Dialogue: Nothing yet. But, MacReady, I've been thinking... If our dogs changed by swallowing parts of that other one... We better see to it that everyone prepares their own food and we eat out of cans.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Gotchya.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Childs, where's that magneto from Chopper One?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Ain't it there?

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: No it ain't there. Would I be asking if it were there?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Move it, Palmer.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Start taking apart those snowmobiles next, huh?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: I got your goodies, superdude.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: What you doin'?

Speaker: blair
Dialogue: Nobody's getting in here. You can tell them all that!

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Well, who the hell you think wants to get in there with you?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Now why'd you go and...

Speaker: blair
Dialogue: And I don't want any more food with sedatives in it. I know what you're up to. Don't think I don't. And if anyone tries to get in here -- I've got rope. I'll hang myself before it gets to me.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: You promise?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Crazy white scientist motherfucker...

Speaker: clark
Dialogue: Gotta go to the can, Childs.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Be quick.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Oh, no.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: No. The generator. You got the auxiliary box just off the kitchen. Get to it.  You fellas okay over there?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Cut that out, Copper.  Nauls? What's taking you?!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: That's impossible, man! Okay, Clark, out of the john where I can see you!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Clark, you come on out here!!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Where's... Where's Garry?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Where are you, Garry? Don't you move an inch, Copper.  Nauls, bring me a goddamn flashlight!

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Somebody's taken it. I can't find it!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: What's happened?!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Yeah!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Well, let's get down there.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Well, hang on!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Where's Sanchez?

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: The fuel pump... it's gone...  You've got to get up to supply, Mca. If we don't get this thing started soon, it'll freeze on us and we'll never get it going.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Who... Who is that?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Sanchez...?  Hey, who...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Somebody definitely messed with it.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: We going to make it?

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Hope so. Another ten, fifteen minutes. What I don't get is...

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: Where were the flashlights?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Screw the flashlights. Where the hell were you?

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Tons of stuff's been missing around here. Magnetos, cables, wire...

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Kitchen things, too...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Anybody see Fuchs... or hear him...? Huh?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Where'd you go?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: I said where? Where'd you go?!

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: Was dark... find a light...

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: You lying bastard...

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: I rather don't like your tone...

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: You sit back down...

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: Enough...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: That storm's going to start ripping any minute -- so we don't have much time.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: We've got to find Fuchs. When we find him -- we kill him.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: Why?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: If he's one of those Things, we've got to get to him before he changes... Nauls, you and Childs and I'll check the outside shacks...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Sanchez, you and Palmer search the inside...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: I ain't going with Sanchez.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: I ain't going with him. I'll go with Childs...

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: Well, screw you, man!

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: I ain't going with you!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Well, who says I want you going with me?!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Cut the bullshit... Okay, Sanchez, you come with us. Norris... you stay here...  And everybody watch whoever you're with. Real close.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Let's move.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: What'd we ever do to these Things anyway...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Don't walk behind me.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Right.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Hey, Blair!!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Has Fuchs been out here?

Speaker: blair
Dialogue: I've changed my mind... I'd... I'd like to come back inside... I don't want to stay out here any more... Funny things... I hear funny things out here.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Have you come across Fuchs?

Speaker: blair
Dialogue: Fuchs...? No, it's not Fuchs... You must let me back in... I won't harm anyone... I promise...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: We'll see...

Speaker: blair
Dialogue: I promise! I'm much better now! I'll be good!! I'm all better!! Don't leave me here!!

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: Let's just not get worried about anything just now.

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: After all this mess.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Auxiliary light cables...? Been cut.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Cut, bullshit. Been pulled apart.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Where's the roof?!

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: This storm do that?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Couldn't be possible. Must have weighted a ton and a half...

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Goddamn white women.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: My babies.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Somebody broke in.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Now who'd go and do...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Childs!!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Let go of me...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Don't get near 'em. The plants! They're alive. Those things can imitate anything...

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: What's it going to do, being a plant?

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: We got to burn 'em.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Now hold on, you dumb...

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: You stupid, sonofa...

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: Whoever put this through him...

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: ...is one bad-ass and strong muther.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: No one's that strong, boy!

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Why didn't it imitate Fuchs? Isn't that its number -- to get more recruits.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Wasn't enough time. Generator was out, what...? Thirty minutes. Takes the bastards an hour, maybe two to absorb somebody.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: Why Fuchs?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: He was working on a test. Fuchs must have been onto something. These bastards got scared and got rid of him.  ...Hey... Where's...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: MacReady!!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Nauls!! MacReady!!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: How long they been out now?

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: Forty... Forty-five minutes.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: We better start closing off the outside hatchways.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Where's MacReady?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Cut him loose of the line up by his shack.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Cut him loose?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: When we were up poking around his place... I found this...

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: ...It was stashed in his old coal furnace... wind must have dislodged it... I don't think he saw me find it.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: ...Made sure I got ahead of him on the towline on the way back... cut him loose.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: MacReady...?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: He's one of them.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: When do you think it got to him?

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Could have been anytime. Anywhere.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: If it did get to him.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Look, man...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: When the lights went out...

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: Would have been a perfect time...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Right. Garry was missing...  ...And Sanchez...

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: Fuck you, Palmer.

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: This is just what it wants... to pit us against each other.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Bullshit! He's got to know damn well I cut it!

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Let's open it.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Hell no.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: You think he's changed into one of those Things?

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: He hasn't had enough time.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: ...Nothing human could have made it back here in this weather without a guideline...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Let's open it. Now...

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Why you so damn anxious to let him in here...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: He's so close. Maybe our best chance to blow him away.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: No. Just let him freeze out there.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: What if we're wrong about him?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Then we're wrong.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: The supply window!

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: What we going to...

Speaker: norris
Dialogue: All right... all right... we've got no choice now...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: What's going on out there?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Damn it, he's got the keys.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: What clothes?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Someone's trying to mark me, you bastard... trying to frame me.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Move in slow now.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Anyone messes with me -- the whole camp goes.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Put those torches on the floor and back off.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: ...back way off.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: ...Where's the rest...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: So help me I mean it!!

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: It's cool, man. We ain't near you, man... Stay cool...

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: Yeah, man, really. Just relax.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Anybody touches me... we go.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: I don't think he's breathing.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Go untie the Doc. Get him in here. Bring the others, too...  From now on no one gets out of my sight.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: So you sweethearts had yourselves a little trial. I just may have to kill you on general principle, Nauls.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: ...Ever occur to the jury that anybody could have gotten to some of my clothes and stuck them up...

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: We ain't buying that.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: You're going to have to sleep sometime.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I'm a real light sleeper, Childs...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: And if anyone tries to wake me...

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: God... what...?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Get out of the way!!

Speaker: clark
Dialogue: What you got in mind, MacReady?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: A little test.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: What kind of test?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I'm sure a lot of you already know.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Palmer, you and Copper tie everyone down. Real tight.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: What for?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: For your health.

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: Let's rush him. He's not going to blow us all up.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Damn if I won't.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: You ain't tying me up.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Then I'll have to kill you.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Then kill me.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I mean it.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: I guess you do.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Tie up Clark, too.

Speaker: palmer
Dialogue: He's dead.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Norris looked pretty dead, himself. Bullets don't kill these Things.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: We should have jumped his ass.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Now Copper, you tie Palmer up.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: We're going to draw a little bit of everybody's blood.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: What are you going to do? Drink it?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Watching Norris in there... gave me the idea that maybe every part of you bastards is a whole. Every piece of you is self-sufficient, an animal unto itself. When a man bleeds it's just tissue. But blood from one of you Things won't obey. It's a newly formed individual with a built-in desire to protect its own life. When attacked, your blood will try and survive -- and crawl away from a hot needle say.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Now you.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Slide it back here.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Now step way back.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I guess you're okay.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I didn't think you'd use that fibrillator on Norris if you were one of them.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Watch them.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Now I'll show you what I already know.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Load of bullshit.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: We'll see. Let's try Clark.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: So Clark was human, huh?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: So that make you a murderer.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Palmer now.

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: Pure nonsense. This won't prove a damn thing.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Thought you'd feel that way, Garry. You were the only one who could have gotten to that blood plasma...  ...we'll do you last...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Copper!!

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Let's do it, Bwana.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Muthafu...

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Get me... get me the hell away from... cut me loose, damn it!

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: I know you gentlemen have been through a lot. But when you find the time... I'd rather not spend the rest of the winter tied to this couch.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Shut the damn hell up.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Blair...

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Everything that's been missing.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Spaceship of some kind.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Smart S.O.B. He put it together piece by piece.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Where was he trying to go?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Anyplace but here.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: But he ain't going to make it.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: What about Childs?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Forget about Childs. He's over.

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: Make 'em short. They'll go off quicker if we need to use them.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: What if it doesn't come?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: It'll come. It needs us. We're the only thing left to imitate...  Give me a hand.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: You and Nauls got to block off the west side bunks, the mess hall and the kitchen.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: You crazy? He might be inside already?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Chance we got to take. We got to force him to come down the east side to the door we got rigged.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: He might just wait us out.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I'm going to blow the generator when you get back. He'll have to come for us -- or freeze.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: We've got portable heaters -- we'll last longer.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: ...Hold it.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Sodium cyanide. We place them between our cheeks and gums... This Thing can't imitate anything that's dead.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: If it gets a hold of you -- bite down... They're supposed to be fast and painless... Now move.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Looks good.

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: One thousand volts. Should be enough.

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: You hear that?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Hear what?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: It's got into the pub! It's turned on the stereo!

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: What?!

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: It's in between us and them!! How we going to get back?!

Speaker: sanchez
Dialogue: I can't hear you.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: What are they doing out there?!

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: What's he saying?

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: MacReady! We been cut off!!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Got to get to the generator.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Get back!!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: The generator!

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Screw the generator!!

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Got Sanchez... World War Three wouldn't mess with this fucker... Can go through walls... And it's like all over the place...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Calm down and get in your position.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Position, my ass...

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: I'm going to bump this up, much as I can.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Boulder Dam might do it.

Speaker: garry
Dialogue: How long's it been?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Little over two hours.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Maybe it ain't coming.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Then we go after him.

Speaker: nauls
Dialogue: Bet the last place you ever go.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Wait...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Okay, creep! Just you and me now! Be on your toes! We're going to do a little remodeling!

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: You like whiskey? Come on, join me for a drink. Be good for you. Grow fangs on your chest.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Damn it, ran out of gas.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Sweetheart, it's going to get mighty cold in here soon... You better make your move... I mean, hell, I'm only one person...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I know you're bugged because we ruined your trip, right? Spiffy little toy you had there.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: But your real hang up is your looks...

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Atta boy. I know you're around.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Come on, sucker.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Did you kill it?

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: I think so.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: What do you mean "you think so?"

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Yeah. I got it.  Pretty mean frostbite.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: It'll turn black again soon enough. Then I guess I'll be losing the whole thing...  ...Think my toes are already gone.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: So you're the only one who made it.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Not the only one.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: The fire's got the temperature way up all over camp... won't last long though.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Neither will we.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Maybe we should try and fix the radio... try and get some help.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Maybe we shouldn't.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: Then we'll never make it.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: Maybe we shouldn't make it.

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: If you're worried about anything, let's take that blood test of yours.

Speaker: macready
Dialogue: If we've got any surprises for each other -- we shouldn't be in any condition to do anything about it.  You play chess?

Speaker: childs
Dialogue: I guess I'll be learning.
